PSCT.Base: While this card is an Equip Card, the equipped monster can be treated as a Tuner if used as Synchro Material. You can only use each of the following effects of "Infernoble Knight Turpin" once per turn. If you control a monster equipped with an Equip Card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but if you Summon it from the GY, banish it when it leaves the field. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 Warrior monster you control; equip this card to that monster you control as an Equip Spell.
